short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks certain Reddit subreddits & posts from showing up in r/popular

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to block posts from certain subreddits or containing certain keywords from appearing in the r/popular Reddit page.

(If modifying the lists by clicking the extension icon, make sure to click on the save button at the bottom to sync to storage)
